thread.title: Clinton returns to Nashua this week
thread.title_full: Clinton returns to Nashua this week

title: Clinton returns to Nashua this week
text:
Clinton returns to Nashua this week By CHRIS GAROFOLOStaff Writer NASHUA - Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton will return to Nashua this week for a fundraiser with local Democrats. Clinton, who was last in New Hampshire on Oct. 5 discussing her plans for education and to curtail gun violence, will attend a meet-and-greet event for the Nashua Democratic City Committee and New Hampshire Young Democrats on Friday, Oct. 16, in the dining commons of Nashua Community College at 505 Amherst St. ... Get more information at nashuatelegraph.com/fullaccess Sign up or Login NASHUA - Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton will return to Nashua this week for a fundraiser with local Democrats. Clinton, who was last in New Hampshire on Oct. 5 discussing her plans for education and to curtail gun violence, will attend a meet-and-greet event for the Nashua Democratic City Committee and New Hampshire Young Democrats on Friday, Oct. 16, in the dining commons of Nashua Community College at 505 Amherst St. Doors will open at 4:15 p.m., and tickets are $25. Those interested in purchasing a ticket may contact JoAnne St. John at 582-0527. She last appeared at the community college in November 2014 to stump for Democratic candidates Maggie Hassan, Jeanne Shaheen and Annie Kuster during the midterms, all of whom won re-election. Additionally, the Clinton campaign on Monday will host U.S. Rep. Xavier Becerra, a California Democrat and chairman of the House Democratic Caucus, to embark on a tour of Latino small businesses and speak at a Latinos for Hillary block party on Monday, Oct. 12. He is expected to outline Clinton's immigration plan and her record of championing the rights and equality for the Latino community. The tour will begin at 5 p.m. at 97 Main St. in Nashua and conclude in time for the block party at the Agave Azul Mexican Restaurant. Top Jobs
